content_aboute_me:
Hi, I'm Erwin (aka Niwer).

Self-taught programmer with 8+ years of experience. I specialize in Java and web development, building robust applications and exploring new technologies. Always eager for new challenges.
form.title:
Got a project or questions?
Let's talk!
form.subtitle:
This form may not work due to Github Pages limitations.
If so, please contact me on discord !
timeline.first_device: Got my first device, a Playstation 2 from my father
timeline.first_computer: First computer, first youtube video, Of course first Minecraft server giving me a passion for programming !
timeline.secondary_school: Secondary School Begins (General line - economic sciences and management IT)
timeline.end_secondary_school: Obtained CESS (End of secondary school diploma) oriented in management IT and economic sciences
project.desc.wayz: WayZ is a Minecraft mod made first for a Zombie post-apocalypse server. Secondly the mod has been updated to be community friendly and to be used in any server. It's include a lot of unique features like a custom crafting system, a custom zombie system, a custom 3D Orineted bouding box collisions system, a custom fast loading content-packs system and so much more !
project.desc.wayz_launcher: The WayZ Launcher is a custom launcher for the WayZ server. It simplifies the installation and management of the main mod and the additionnal ones (Sodium, Iris, etc), ensuring that players have the best experience possible. The Launcher is open-source now with some removed features (auto-updater and other network required things).
project.desc.web_showcase: A website made for my web courses using PHP, HTML and CSS. It include a article/news system, a team system, a department system, a contact form and a much more !
project.desc.integrative_activity: A small game inspired by HEX. Made for my java courses. This include a bridge system, red and blue players and preview system !
project.desc.gaspar: A discord.js bot that include an AI system that can talk with you. It's configurable and can be used in any server.
project.desc.glsl_obfuscator: This is an open-source GLSL obfuscator written in Java. It can be used as a Java library or as a Gradle plugin. It includes many features such as variable renaming, GLSL code minification, and much more.
project.desc.open_vanilla: A Bukkit/Spigot plugin designed to create an enhanced Vanilla Minecraft experience. It includes features such as homes, a hub, administrator commands like /invsee, /ec, /broadcast, a currency system, and much more.
project.desc.interpol_red_notice_finder: This is a small web game (HTML/CSS/JS) in which you have to guess the crimes committed by the displayed person. The game uses Interpol’s public API to fetch criminal data.
